4.ques: What is your philosophy towards work?
4.exp: I have only one philosophy when it comes to work: every piece of work, regardless of size, has to be done on time and in the right manner.
4.act: I have only one philosophy when it comes to work: every piece of work, regardless of size, has to be done on time

5.exp: Basically, my management style comes with promptness and flexibility. To make sure goals are achieved, I religiously study and make plans down to the smallest detail. While I do implement a strict sense of being time bounded, I also add reasonable allowances and make room for contingencies.
5.act: My management style is all about planning every detail and working in a time bound manner. I think that flexibility is also important.

3.ques: Are you willing to work overtime? Nights? Weekends?
3.exp: Yes. I understand that being asked to work for an extended number of hours comes with a good reason in the first place, so Iím ok with it. It an extra effort means something for the company, I will be happy to do it.
3.act: es. I understand that being asked to work for an extended number of hours comes with a good reason in the first place, so Iím ok with it. It an extra effort means something for the company, Iíll be happy to do it.

6.ques: Do your skills match this job or another job more closely?
6.exp: I feel my skills are the best fit for this job.
6.act: I think that my skills are the best match for this job.

2.ques: Are you a team player? Why or why not?
2.exp: Yes, definitely. I am the one person every leader would want in his team. I have a great team spirit and like to work together with many people. I have strong communication skills. Whatever task is assigned to me, I make sure it meets and exceeds what is expected of me. I also make it a point to reach out to teammates whenever needed.
2.act: Yes. I am a team player. I have a strong team spirit. I like working together and collaborating with people. My communication skills are pretty strong too. I also sincerely complete the tasks assigned to me.
